title: I am in LOVE with SHEIN!!! üíóüíó
text: SHEIN is an amazing clothing app with cute and cheap clothes!!!! For example, I got biker shorts at TJ Maxx for $15, and there is a pair on SHEIN that are very similar for $5. SHEIN also gives many opportunities to earn points and coupons to make products even cheaper! They have live streams every week where you can earn lots of points! And tune in to have fun! The outfits on SHEIN are so adorable and I‚Äôm ordering a bunch of clothes and outfits for my Youth Camp soon! You can also review products you have bought to earn points, and there is a free trial center where you can get free clothes and outfits! One final way I earn points is creating outfits on the app to win contests! If you want to check out my outfits my name is Lauren May. Don‚Äôt forget to like them if you think they are cute please! ‚ù§Ô∏èüíï Again, I love SHEIN and definitely recommend it for anyone wanting cute, cheap clothes! Come join the SHEINGals!!! üíï

title: The most Horrible website and service
text:
I‚Äôm very disgusted with the way SHEIN handles the inconvenience of your order being delivered. I ordered $200 dollars worth of accessories. They shipped my package late. When the package got to USPS, The package never got delivered to me. I go to the post office to pick it up and they can‚Äôt find my package. They tell me to contact SHEIN. I contact SHEIN by virtual chat. They ask me if I want a refund or reorder. I let them know I want my order because I never received it in the first place and they had already taken out the money from my card. They place the order again and tell me that some of my items are out of stock so I have to take the refund. I explain to them how is that my fault if I didn‚Äôt receive the first package. Shein and USPS were giving me the run around. I ask them to accommodate me for the inconvenience and sent my package express shipping so that I can receive it and they told me no. I can just get my refund, that my refund will take 7-14 business days. What baffled me was they were quick to take my money, I still haven‚Äôt received neither one of my packages. I would never recommend nor shop on this app ever again.
 Angry Customer

title: Terribly made clothes and inconsistent
text: So I bought from these guys not that long ago, and I decided to go a size up and get an extra large and in a dress I got I got a one XL so that was two sizes up. When I received all the clothes none of it was true to size. One of the extra large T-shirts I got look like it would fit somebody who was a small and maybe a medium. The dress which I got as a plus size dress would never fit a plus size girl with large boobs or even big arms and I don‚Äôt even have big arms. Then my account was having issues going to an email I don‚Äôt have and I was getting no response from them and no help. I had somebody process my return and say I would receive a shipping label within 24 hours which I never received. I spent about $70 on stuff that doesn‚Äôt even fit me, and are sizes up that I normally wear in every other brand that fits fine. Also the clothes is extremely cheaply made and feels terrible. The best thing I bought was the cheapest thing I bought which was a butterfly clip. So if you are to buy anything from them maybe buy accessories but I would never buy clothes.

title: Doesn‚Äôt Have enough clothes for plus sized people
text: Good app their clothes are wonderful, but I‚Äôm tired of clicking on a nice clothing I see and for it to only go up to sizes 8/10(L). Clothing sites should really fix this like not everybody is skinny, and the clothes SHEIN provides for plus sized women sometimes looks like maternity wear. Like c‚Äômon I‚Äôm not wearing anything with flowers on it it look disgusting save that for ya mother not me. Why do skinny people get the nice trendy clothes and the plus sized women get the clothes you‚Äôll find laying around in a vintage thrift store. Please this is ridiculous fashionnova may be expensive be at least they‚Äôre changing the sizing on clothes and not stealing designs. Anyways, download the app it‚Äôs good for jewelry, bags, and makeup tools. To any plus sized girl reading this don‚Äôt change your mind on downloading the app it‚Äôs still many pretty clothes I found on the app for girls like us, but it‚Äôs hard you gotta look babe.

title: Great for limited spending :)
text: I am a freshman and my parents are starting a realistic budget system for my clothes and hygienic shopping every month (along with anything else I would like to buy). My go-to would have been Target or Walmart, but my friend told me about Shein, so I figured I might as well try it out. I spend about $25 for shampoo, conditioner, body wash and deodorant if I need any extra along with tooth paste, etc. If I didn't start buying my clothing from Shein, I would definitely be broke because instead of paying up to $60-$70 on clothing, I can spent $20-$30 for the same amount of items, sometimes with even better quality! I highly suggest anyone looking for cheaper but good quality clothing to look at Shein, you don't even have to create an account before you browse and I bet within seconds your entire cart will be full and only cost about $100-$150.

title: Surprisingly, it isnt terrible
text:
Aside from all the controversy surrounding Shein (which I didnt know about until a while after getting it), the app itself isnt so bad. Its easy to navigate and Ive ordered plenty of clothes, accessories, and other things from them by now and Ive been satisfied with almost all of my purchases, only dissatisfied with a few because I forgot to check the sizes.

The coupons are eh, theyre nice to have but tend to have limits to how much they take off, so like a 60% coupon for a $70 purchase will probably have a $20 limit to how much you save. Its not that bad though unless youre ordering a huge hall of things at once.

The point system is okay, it takes FOREVER to build up a bunch of points that are worth anything since one point is equal to one cent. Although you get points for writing reviews on your purchases, its hardly anything special unless you build up the points for a long period of time to spend all at once.

I usually buy clothes, so I cant say much for some other things, but some clothes I was pleasantly surprised with while others were pretty cheap feeling which is what I expect from how low the prices are, but theyre still nice and I have fun just scrolling through the app to see what clothes Ill buy next.

If you dont really care about the controversy surrounding Shein and if you want good prices on things then its a pretty good option.

title: Great selections for all ages!!
text: I‚Äôm a 42 year old mother of 3; ages 19, 8 and 6 with a 36 year old fianc√© and a 69 year old mother. I have found amazing items for everyone on Shein and I order from them quite regularly. Not only do they have every possible style in clothing for amazing prices but I find items for our dogs as well as household items AND tons of arts and crafts supplies which I am very passionate about. Oh yeah and stickers!!! I love stickers! LoL- I really am a kid at heart! I buy packs of them and I throw them in with gifts in a gift bag, I use them with scrapbooking and other arts and crafts with the kids and I hand out some of the motivational ones to people when they seem like they could use a little cheering up! Shein is my ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù place to shop as well as app to just browse through when I‚Äôm bored as they have new items added daily! Check them out. I highly doubt you‚Äôll regret it!

title: Heading in the right direction but‚Ä¶
text: I can‚Äôt deny that shein is really a staple right now ! The clothes are hot , the fit is so right on me & the prices won‚Äôt break your bank. Not to mention the fact that you can use afterpay. Really a saving grace. But y‚Äôall need to keep up with times. The plus size clothes aren‚Äôt sewn together as well, the seams are in the weirdest places‚Ä¶ that could be better. I‚Äôm addition , I‚Äôm a petite girl with a BOOTY let me see some more models that look like meeeeee! Y‚Äôall have too many shoppers of color with unique bodies that post all on Instagram and tag y‚Äôall. Let them get a piece of the pie. Feature them in your photos so I can seeeeee what it may look like on me. I haven‚Äôt bought a lot of bottoms from y‚Äôall for that reason. When we can‚Äôt try it on before buying we need to see it on unique & similar to us body types so we have a better idea of the fit. Get with the times

title: Customer service
text: They‚Äôre customer service is amazing! During the Black Friday sale they were having so many troubles getting people their orders and I ended having to wait two months before i even saw just one of the products that I ordered. After waiting so long I finally decided to ask for a refund because it was 100% lost at this point. They don‚Äôt have a number to call but the app works fantastic! And all I had to do was just text a representative and my refund was being immediately processed. I‚Äôve dealt with many name brand products before and never has their customer service owned up to the mistake, nor could process the refund in a timely matter. I immediately ordered from them again and don‚Äôt regret a single thing! This isn‚Äôt just some cheap (wish) type clothing either. My favorite clothes/accessories come from this store and they last forever! Not a lot of brands can say that.

title: Amazing Online Shopping App!! ü©∑
text: When I first found out Shien i was so into all the clothing and all the other stuff on their. My sister said to my mom that she found this app called Shien and my mom was really curious what the app was about so my sister talked to my mom that the app is about a online clothing store that is really good. So my mom agreed on having a try to buy some clothes from there and boy were the clothes looking exactly like the image!! + the clothing size. And the fact it only takes a couple of days to send. We once bought more than 10 items on shien and it came in like 3-4 days kinda worth the wait but still also worth it!! And I love the fact it has a picture of the person wearing the items they bought on the specific type of clothing/item!! Not sure what else to talk about but yeah! That‚Äôs my opinion on why Shien is the best ONLINE clothing store‚ÄºÔ∏èü©∑ü©∑

title: It‚Äôs ok.
text: The app it self is fun to use and the clothing looks so appealing and looks like good quality on the models in the photos but when you place your order Bases on there size charts, and nothing fits when it shows up. Then your screwed. I placed a very large order and NOTHING fit and it was all poor quality. You get free return on your first return ONLY, so if shows up in poor quality or doesn‚Äôt match the listing descriptions then you as the buyer have to pay to have it returned.. also I ordered some sexy lingerie and it was super poor quality and the tops and bottoms were 2 different sizes... I didn‚Äôt even try them on, but come to find out lingerie is not returnable even if it does not match the listing . Wasn‚Äôt happy with my first purchase so I will not be ordering from this site again.. I have looked up the SAME exact clothes on other sites and most of it was way cheaper. It‚Äôs all coming from the same venders in China so shop around before you check out. Because if you order from somewhere else then at least it will be able to get free returns when it shows up not as described.

title: Best place for bikinis
text: I really love SHEIN. I‚Äôve been ordering there for awhile for swimsuits. I know they have clothes, accessories, and so much more but I use it for bikinis. The quality is almost always good, but sometimes not so much. You learn what to get and what to leave alone after a little while, but it doesn‚Äôt matter much if you don‚Äôt like something or it doesn‚Äôt fit right because it is literally SO CHEAP. I will say that the clothes run extremely small. I always size up in everything. If you are plus size, they have stuff for that but you will definitely want to avoid the regular size stuff (sizes small to large, I mean). They have a VERY wide selection of swimsuits. They have every style and they‚Äôre always really cute. The shipping can take awhile sometimes if you order a lot of stuff, but in my experience they usually come in a very timely manor. Overall, I am very satisfied with my experience ordering from here.

title: Great Clothing
text: At first I was skeptical but I tried them and can‚Äôt seem to stop. I‚Äôve never been disappointed with the fashion styles and the size is right on point! However, I did have a problem once. I order a number of outfits. When I went on the app I noticed how certain items were ‚Äúsupposedly‚Äù being delivered separately. Two or 3  of those items I never got. When I contacted customer support, the good thing is they responded quickly but the bad part was that they were consistent about every item was delivered. Oh and 1 dress that was delivered was the wrong size. The return prices for that dress was easy but for the items I never received- I never received a refund either. Nonetheless, I then realized that apparently they can‚Äôt handle large requests. Some thing is bound to pop up missing. Since then I‚Äôve ordered 1 or 2 items and have had no problems. Overall I trust their clothing and the pricing is unbeatable.

title: Liked items glitch
text: I love shein and am willing to change my review if they fix this. I order a lot of items at a time and I recently went to fill up my cart with items I‚Äôve previously saved. When I go to my saved items it probably does say the correct number of items I‚Äôve ever saved, but the second I tap something in the filters to find something SPECIFIC that I‚Äôve saved, most of the items are gone. Some things I can‚Äôt find unless I scroll all the way through my 32,000 liked items or I go to search for it in the search bar. For example I wanted to get  something pink I saved before but when I filtered pink items it showed like 5. I know I have liked more than 5 pink shirts since I‚Äôve started using shein. Another example is I wanted a pair of jeans I‚Äôve saved before, and I know I‚Äôve saved a lot, but when I tapped bottoms then denim/jeans, it only showed like 10 items.  It‚Äôs very frustrating. Hope you can fix and update me so I can rate you guys 5 stars like you would deserve if this is fixed :) thank you.

title: So far no complaints
text: I‚Äôve ordered activewear and didn‚Äôt expect too much because of previous reviews on social media but I took a leap. I‚Äôm so happy with everything I ordered this far. I‚Äôve ordered twice more and waiting for some of the stuff to come in but when I tell the sizing and material are perfect thus far. No ripping or struggling to fit any of the outfits and I‚Äôm a little shook. I know everything won‚Äôt be perfect but right no complaints. I even ordered some sneakers and did expect much, when I tell you that they are so comfortable and that I made it through a 2 hour gym class and my feet didn‚Äôt hurt at all. That‚Äôs what made me come and write a review. I‚Äôm the type of person that if I like something I will buy it in all colors. I‚Äôm trying not to do that since I‚Äôm a senior and really don‚Äôt need that much clothes and shoes but I want a backup pair for just in case????

title: It was good
text: I‚Äôm 11, so I got the kids size in 11-12, and the materials were okay, I mean they weren‚Äôt like a bad material, some of them just felt like swim suit material. And other then that every thing else was pretty good. I mean I‚Äôm 11, and my parents don‚Äôt really like me wearing a lot of crop tops, so if you don‚Äôt want your kids to be wearing crop tops then I recommend getting a size bigger. Like I got 30+ items, and they were all awesome, fit well, but I do have to say the there were two things my parents didn‚Äôt let me wear because they were super cropped. So yeah make sure you look at the reviews on the item because some people put pics of what it looks like. And I have a bigger chest (breast) then a lot of kids my age, so a lot of the thing were more cropped on me, so keep that in mind that if you have a bigger chest it might be more cropped. But over all, great clothing app and or website.ü§™

title: Best app
text: SHEIN, is a very good app and I love ordering from there. They have pretty affordable stuff, all thought I can only order from it once a month. And I like to keep my budget under 100$ al thought I want to buy a lot at once, I keep a lot of coupons but what I‚Äôm tying to say is maybe instead of only using one coupon at checkout we should at least be able to use 2. it‚Äôs better and affordable for most people including me. It would be very helpful and I also have a lot of coupons to spend on every purchase but I don‚Äôt order that often bcuz of how expensive my checkouts are. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm trying to say we should at least be able to use 2 coupons at checkout, once again it would be helpful, and maybe. Every 100 points could be 2+ it‚Äôs sad trying to grind my points and the sad point is I have to get 200 points in order to actually only 2$ at checkout. and points can be pretty hard to grind.

title: love it!!!
text: so much easier then any other online shopping app i‚Äôve used, high quality clothes that are true to size! also the detailed ratings other customers leave undoubtably help! plus your able to find your size by answering easy survey questions that are very accurate. Shein also lets you track your order at all times and gives detailed descriptions on where it‚Äôs located. however, one of the best benefits Shein offers  is whenever you shop you earn ‚ÄúShein points‚Äù that you can use to get great discounts on top of so many coupons that Shein supplies. even if you find that you may not be able to fully pay for a purchase at a certain time, they have options such as a payment plan or they let you order your item and pay later! highly recommend this app to all my friends and to any girl or guy looking for a reliable shopping app :)

title: Amazing app!
text: SHEIN is an amazing app to find trendy clothes! It is a bit hard to leave reviews or I‚Äôm just stupid! You have to fully read the description of clothing or you probably shouldn‚Äôt have your expectations set to high because SHEIN does have a lot of good clothing but some clothing items don‚Äôt have the best quality/material. SHEIN has many styles you will most likely love! You name it, they have it! I personally love SHEIN but the shipping takes forever! At least a month but I live in America so of course shipping from China it would take awhile. I have heard rumors that they can steal your information but I personally haven‚Äôt had any problems with that so it‚Äôs probably nothing to worry about! :) Other than that SHEIN is a great app and I don‚Äôt have many complaints. I definitely recommend this app!! And if your kid wants some clothes off of here they have a cute kids section! Amazing experience on SHEIN and I will definitely continue to buy off of here! I‚Äôll edit my review if I have any problems!

title: Very surprised by this store
text: I learned about Shein from a coworker who was wearing a really cute necklace that I asked about and she said Shein. I had no idea what a Shein was so I looked it up and decided to look for the necklace. I found it but also came across so many cute items but was very hesitant because of the low prices of the items, so I figured they cheaply made items from China‚Ä¶ no offenses. I took a chance and the necklace along with a dress and I was pleasantly pleased with the item and quality. Since then I‚Äôve been shopping with Shein regularly and have been quite surprised at majority of the items I have ordered are pretty well made. Maybe one or two items I received I didn‚Äôt like. I‚Äôm usually a somewhat high end shopper but Shein has changed that a bit. I always get compliments on the stuff that I have purchased. Shein has become my go to spot for cute items.

title: Not a scam if you just read reviews so you know exactly what your getting!
text: Everything is so cheap and all the reviews tell me exactly what I need to know! There‚Äôs a bug where if I‚Äôm trying to add something to my wishlist it won‚Äôt add no matter how many times I click the button. But it‚Äôs ok because if I click the actual item it adds it right before I get into the page if that makes any sense. I‚Äôm waiting for my order to get here and it‚Äôs very useful that I can just go into the app and check to see if they processed or shipped it yet! It‚Äôs not a scam for sure and if you read the reviews they can tell you exactly what you need to know so you don‚Äôt make a bad purchase. The only misleading thing I saw was a skirt set with a top that looked normal but turns out it was made of spandex like material. That‚Äôs only an issue if you don‚Äôt go for that type of stuff though! It was still super cute on the girl in the picture who posted the review :)

title: Please be cautious when buying from here.
text: Now I‚Äôm not saying to avoid the app altogether, I‚Äôm saying to be cautious because I‚Äôve only used SHEIN twice. My first time using SHEIN was in 2019 and I had ordered 2 small items, one of those items didn‚Äôt show up (package arrived empty and damaged.) and the other was horrible quality. I spent around 26 dollars which wasn‚Äôt too bad . But now fast forward to the Present I‚Äôve decided to order from SHEIN again after what happened in the past because SHEIN is insanely popular despite the allegations(so I assumed it was safe). 2 weeks ago I‚Äôve ordered my cart which was over 100 dollars. That package never arrived and basically was considered lost. I tried contacting the company but every time I reached out, there would be no other line and no help. So I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs the tracking company or just SHEIN but either way they scammed me out of my 100+ dollars and I still haven‚Äôt gotten that package. I‚Äôve never had any other trouble ever with online shopping with any other company except for SHEIN. Please be cautious when using this dangerous app and do your research.

title: No human contact
text: First off, the site has variety of things to be purchased. However, if there‚Äôs an issue with something, there‚Äôs no human contact or phone number to speak to anyone. Only a bot that keeps repeating the same thing over and over. I placed an order and did a return because the stuff I ordered was too big and just wanted to exchange it. Well, no way to exchange, you have to return it get a refund and reorder. Well, I did this and sent my stuff back the very next day which was 12 days ago. I still have no refund or any info or anyone to talk to about it. And mind you, this was my first time using this company and will be the last. Feels like a scam to me now. I spent well over $100 on clothes, which is a fair amount for what they charge for clothing and it was a tester order with the thought of ordering more, but now I‚Äôm truly irritated with not being able to speak or text a human. How can you have a company without people to answer real questions?  They have decent reviews and I could have had a rare experience, but really not feeling them after this.

title: A company to trust
text:
I am a grandma buying for my 13 year old grandson who wears a man‚Äôs size medium to large. He likes clothes that are stylish and cool, and I like ones that are affordable. We are both thrilled with SHEIN.  I was very apprehensive with my first order but found them to be very professional and customer friendly. Service was fast and prompt. After we received the first order, I waited to see how the clothes were after the first wash‚Ä¶.it was great. We have received 3 orders since and I am about to place another before Christmas. My grandson loves SHEIN clothes.

We haven‚Äôt had any luck buying jeans that fit but I just give them to one of his friends. I guess the one thing I would like them to work on is an easier return policy. But the quality of their service, quick responses to emails, and clothing style and prices far outshine any complaints I may have. Thank you!

title: Impressive
text: I‚Äôm very impressed by the quality of the website as well as the products. It is easy to search for items and I appreciate how the site identifies items you select and finds you similar items. There are so many available options and a variety of choices. The prices are amazing. I haven‚Äôt had any problems with orders everything seems pretty true to size. Orders arrive in less than two weeks whether it‚Äôs regular shipping or Xpress. So far I have purchased almost 10 bathing suits all at under $10 for both a top and a bottom after discounts. They have items from baby sizes to adult and curvy. I just started purchasing some home items and I look forward to them expanding that department. They even remembered to offer items for pets of all kinds. The only thing that would make it better is if it arrived the next day!

title: disappointed
text: overall the clothes and accessories are pretty much what u pay for as in the quality. the issue i have and why i‚Äôm kinda disappointed is because i spent over $60 on clothes and accessories and after 2 or 3 days of tracking my package i get a notification saying that my package can‚Äôt be delivered because nobody‚Äôs was home except it showed my package still in a state that‚Äôs no where close to mine. i was confused and a bit frustrated because there wasn‚Äôt an explanation on how it could even be delivered when it wasn‚Äôt even in my state yet. i ended up calling UPS to check where my package even is and the woman i was talking to said that it was still in that different state and that it was questionable why i got a notification from SHEIN saying it couldn‚Äôt be delivered because no one was home. she ended up shipping my package again and it‚Äôs on its way but i went to SHEIN and surprisingly i‚Äôm still able to track the package on the app even though SHEIN said they couldn‚Äôt deliver it for no actual reason still.

title: The Best Shopping App I‚Äôve Ever Used ~
text: SHEIN not only has cheap clothes, but they are decent quality too. When some items come in, however ~ you can tell they were cheaply made, but when you put it on - it doesn‚Äôt make you LOOK cheap. I always feel so confident in all of the clothes I‚Äôve bought from SHEIN. It also has an EXTREMELY easy to use app that almost doubles as a second Pinterest. You can make boards for different items you want to save to buy later, and SHEIN makes it pretty easy and fun to earn points for making posts and leaving reviews. This incentivizes other shoppers to leave reviews on items which always helps me decide what size would be best before ordering something. Lastly, You can get a lot for a little and the shipping time always arrives earlier than the stated dates. I am thoroughly happy shopping with SHEIN and I highly recommend it.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
text:
Over the years I‚Äôve ordered from 2 other ‚Äútoo good to be true‚Äù discount sites only to end up with clothing that looked nothing like the pictures and rather like something from the discount rack at Dollar General. The articles of clothing I received from Wish and Berrylook were literally unwearable and made for a great laugh on social media. 

However, I was crazy enough to try Shein after reading the reviews. I was pleasantly surprised that their clothing actually is decent quality for the price and was presented accurately as pictured. The fabric was true to color and texture as pictured on the models. The sizing has been very accurate so far also. 

My daughter and I love this site and will order more in the future. We are now on our second order. It‚Äôs a great site to get a quick wardrobe refresh and a great place to find all sorts of accessories also.

title: Good but not perfect
text: So many things had happened to me since April I started to using the App but I never received a good products. Everything was poorly made. In the pictures Everything seems like perfect casual dress üëó and everything but after you purchased them you‚Äôll see all fake stuffs. Even though I believe what customers service said to me about their products but I wasn‚Äôt fully satisfied because they were fooling around me and all of us. I know most people will recommend this app but I‚Äôm not. Moreover, I believe that you‚Äôll get good stuffs sometimes with less prices. But don‚Äôt believe what you see though the phone I meant we definitely need to see the product in person to know what material we exactly taking. Remember sometimes salt looks like a sugar so, don‚Äôt make any mistakes. Also it took more than two weeks to arrive. If you ordered something around 1 or 2 dollars it would be more than 6 dollars with shipping and tax isn‚Äôt it wired. Like seriously üòí nobody wants to purchased 50 dollars at once so yeah that‚Äôs all. Hope you understand me very well. I‚Äôll give 40 out of üíØ

title: Normalize being tall and small
text:
I love Shein, don‚Äôt get me wrong but we are in more progressive times, meaning that brands should start accommodating to ALL BODIES, not just being one size. Most of your models are around the size of 5‚Äô8‚Äù or so, even the plus size models. I stand for petite people, we can adjust our clothes, but it is annoying, liking one piece of clothes but seeing that even the smallest size doesn‚Äôt fit and it‚Äôs really upsetting, now imagine taller people. They can‚Äôt just add extra fabric to clothes unlike how plenty of us petite people who can just hem and sew our clothes. My point is, begin to normalize ALL types of bodies, not just plus size. Plus size people can also be taller or more petite. I believe that if I have a hard time finding clothes for myself as someone who is 4‚Äô10‚Äù, many others will too. If you want more people to buy your clothes, offer more sizes. 

Other than that, I can comfortably buy shirts and shorts sometimes too. I love your brand but please start creating long and petite sizes, we would all greatly appreciate it.

title: MY FAV WEBSITE
text:
SHEIN is my fav website. Great prices for great products! Whenever I got a jacket that was very see through and I wanted to return it, SHEIN was very kind and let me return it for free, gave me SHEIN points (which are points u get when u daily check in or buy something and they points are just used as money) and they gave me a coupon, AND the also gave me an AMAZING quality jacket for free that I‚Äôm literally wearing at the moment! I wear it ALL the time! SHEIN‚Äôs costumer service is top notch, and that‚Äôs one of my fav things abt SHEIN, that and the super cute and trendy but affordable clothes they have. The dont only have clothes though, they have EVERYTHING! They even have toothpaste squeezers and bar soap holders etc. I LOVE their stuff!!! I placed an order a few days ago and I CANT wait to get it!!!!! Ahhhh!!
But whenever I need something no matter what it is I ALWAYS turn to SHEIN! My fav app ever! Check out SHEIN and I promise u won‚Äôt regret it! Have a good day! And wear a mask! üíú

title: SHEIN is amazing!!
text:
I‚Äôm a person who browses a lot of sites, and with that comes online shopping as well. Shein is one of the best sites I‚Äôve ever seen, with affordable prices and a pretty good quality.

Their app is easy to navigate, and includes real people profiles. I love many of the features included within the app. The review system gives a good understanding of what the products comes out to be. I also adore the size chart, and the sizes are very detailed, giving an exact measurement. 

I suggest always looking over the reviews if you plan on buying from Shein. Although, majority of clothing items are great quality, some are deceiving. The reviews and size chart gives a good idea. There is usually 5-20 reviews per item, and it helps a ton. I always go through each one, to see whether I need a size difference, or even if I would like the material.

I love the kids section, as many other brands online don‚Äôt have a ton of clothes for kids unless they are a larger company. The clothes aren‚Äôt so girly and sparkly like some other stores, and really fits anyone‚Äôs style.

The fact that Shein offers accessories and add-ons is amazing as well! They are sturdy and very beautiful. I would just recommend that they were also sold in one pieces, since most come in bundles or bunches of jewelry. The bags are beautiful!

Overall, Shein is a lifechanger. Their clothing varies, but is fashionable.

title: Amazing I love it
text:
SHEIN is a must have in your life. I work in a bank and wear business casual 6 days a week so I was frantic when I had to change my whole wardrobe in 2 weeks!! I‚Äôm on the bigger side of the scale so it‚Äôs always hard to find clothes in stores that will fit me much less business clothing. So I relied on SHEIN for all my needs. Prices are great and budget friendly. Plus they partner with Afterpay and you can use it to make 4 payments on your purchase rather than dropping it all in one day! 

I had some clothes come in that were to big or to small so I did a return. I am not going to lie I was a little nervous to do it because I‚Äôve heard good and bad but my experience was amazing!! Do right and return things properly and everything will go smooth! I‚Äôm not saying that‚Äôs not the case for some people but I have nothing bad to say about SHEIN! I love love love them!!!

title: Affordable, cute, good quality!
text: I started purchasing from Shein when I was looking for affordable workout clothes.  I tend to go through workout clothes fast, since I go to the gym almost every day,  and then have to retire them.  I have made many purchases from Shein.  I love their sports bras the most! They have so many styles and lots of cute stuff.  Their workout tops are great too.  The thing I appreciate the most is that everything is very affordable.  This keeps me coming back for more!  I have also bought a few tee shirts which I like as well and felt are decent quality.  I usually get my packages within 1 week of ordering.  I had to make a return once due to sizing issues and the process was seamless!  Super easy and they notify you when they receive the return and refund the money ect.  I look forward to making more purchases from them!

title: Repeat customer
text: I‚Äôve been shopping with Shein since early 2017&have yet to be disappointed. Out of everything I‚Äôve ordered I got one shirt that I didn‚Äôt like, it was as described, I just didn‚Äôt like it for the look I planned to pair it with so that was on me not the company. The shipping is pretty fast, the items are quality. I would say when ordering pay attention to the sizing because a lot of the items tend to run small but if you size up you‚Äôre fine. I like the fact that they stay on trend and you have so many options for things to order all the way down to home accessories. I love to add pieces to my favorites and order a few pieces from my favorites everytime I shop. If you do need to return or exchange the process is easy and they credit you back as soon as they receive the returned item. I‚Äôll continue to shop with Shein until they disappoint me and I don‚Äôt anticipate the disappointment.

title: Love it here
text: I‚Äôve been shopping on Shein for a few years now and not once have I had an issue. They have a overwhelming abundance of options to choose from whether you want clothes, home decor, accessories, shoes..you name it! Some stuff I‚Äôve ordered isn‚Äôt always flattering on me but if it‚Äôs cute I‚Äôd just go and get it tailored or change the size if needed. The deliveries are fairly fast considering the distance that it‚Äôs traveling. Free returns too on top of free shipping in most cases..that‚Äôs quite a perk. Love the clothes sooo much, never had anything defective or messed up in general by them. The app is great and yeah sure they text and email a lot but there are new drops like everyday within their many categories of clothes. You can always unsubscribe from either of those if you like. I‚Äôm overall very satisfied with Shein and they get 5 stars in my book every trip üñ§

title: Allowed SpeedX to steal my package
text: My last experience with SHEIN was horrible. They allowed this new company to steal my package and made me wait another 10 days for nothing. The company noted my package was undeliverable because they couldn‚Äôt ‚Äúfind it in the warehouse‚Äù. SHEIN told me they had it and made me wait another 10 days when I asked over and over again for them to reship my stuff and have the people ship it back to them since I already waited 2 weeks. I waited a total of 3 weeks- 1 month just for SHEIN to refund my money when items are now out of stock and more expensive then when I bought them. Good customer service would‚Äôve told them to resend the package and retrieve the package back from the fraud shipping company THEY HIRED. The shipping company had no way for you to contact them. It was a number on the site but they noted they weren‚Äôt taking calls and didn‚Äôt respond to text. Why would you hire a shipping company that you couldn‚Äôt even contact ? Ridiculous and horrible experience and customer service was not helpful. Very disappointed in SHEIN for the service i received.

title: I hate their change in policy
text: I have been with SHEIN for years. I‚Äôve been using the shopping app since high school, and I have recommended it to all my friends and family for years. I have always stressed that SHEIN has high quality clothes for low prices, depending on which things you buy. I always check the reviews to see other customers reviews before I make my purchase. I always liked SHEIN because they had one significant difference. Unlike fashion nova, SHEIN, had free exchanges and returns. SHEIN to me was like fashion nova but the reason I stopped shopping at fashionNova was, whenever I bought clothes that didn‚Äôt fit I was forced to pay for my return, which wasn‚Äôt always worth it. Unlike them SHEIN offered free returns and exchanges and I have been with them for years. This recent change in their return policy will lead me to delete this app. I found out from my brother who couldn‚Äôt return his package. He has stopped shopping from SHEIN. I placed a order and was told my next package I would be charged $7.99. This is news to me. I will no longer be shopping from here again.

title: Love it

title: BEST OF THE BEST

title: From Wish to THIS!!
text: I was looking for another app similar to WISH & at first, I was pretty skeptical but honestly... this site is soooo much better!! I spend so much money on WISH (I‚Äôm addicted to online shopping & finding these for the low) but I wanted something that would give me better options & this is def the place to go. They have all kinds of super cute clothes for cheap, honest reviews, the app is fun, the options are large & customer service is amazing! You do have to remember that everything is China sized so make sure to read the reviews & pay attention to the sizes. This app is wayyy better than WISH hands down!! It‚Äôs put together better. Loveeee ittttt!!!! I won‚Äôt be shopping on wish anymore unless it‚Äôs for something small like a buck just to see what it is or something I won‚Äôt regret buying for 5 bucks cause it was fun to play with. Thank you SHEIN for changing the game on cheap clothing apps for the LOW LOW.

title: Great app but could improve
text: SHEIN is a great app for finding fun clothing at an affordable price! I love this app and often find myself looking through it and finding lots of cute clothing. That being said, there could be some improvements in the clothing. I am a small person so finding clothing that fits my small body type can be tricky. Most of the models in the pictures are around 5‚Äô7-5‚Äô8 and have large breasts in the pictures. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, the models are beautiful but not everyone is in size C bra types and average height. When I look for swimsuits I have to look to see in reviews if anyone more my size has posted a picture so I can see how it looks on a person who is my size. A lot of the clothing isn‚Äôt small enough so I have to pass on a lot of great outfits and swimsuits. I can also see how this could affect tall women too seeing as how there are only sizes for clothing that are either average or plus size. Other than that, I would definitely recommend this site for anyone looking to buy affordable clothing :)

title: Cool app with a few glitches
text: I really like this app because the quality of some clothes are good and very Affordable. However it does have its flaws. i ordered a few things from shein for the first time a week ago and I received my package a few days ago. The shipping didn‚Äôt take a while which was surprising due to the holidays. The quality of the clothes is very good, not itchy at all, And soft.  My only complaints is the reviews and the measurements. I added my reviews(with pictures) on the few clothing pieces I purchased and it got deleted?? I‚Äôm not sure why. A few days later, I check to see my reviews and it was there. however there was no images which was really weird. The measurements... super weird as well. I am size m and petite and I was going based on the measurements of the clothing pieces. I kept getting L & XL?? I was going to order based on the reviews and ordered the majority of my clothes in size M and they all fit like a glove. Please fix this problem.

title: Very impressed!!!

title: LOVE Shein!
text: If you know how to measure yourself (or if you can‚Äôt measure yourself but know how to read reviews) Shein is really the best place to go for inexpensive clothing! After having a baby and then living in the pandemic era right after, I was a whole new size when I had to return to my job, not in a good way. I spent the first year in the office rotating the same two pair of dress pants and about 5 shirts that i didn‚Äôt feel good in. I felt gross and frumpy, never put together‚Ä¶until I met SHEIN. Shein (and all the helpful customer reviews on each article of clothing) got me together! If you hit the flash sales and make use of the coupons, you could easily build a decent wardrobe for under 500$, whereas if you go to the mall, that 500$ isn‚Äôt going to get you much at all. I tell everyone i know about this website and app. I can‚Äôt believe i didn‚Äôt know about it sooner!

title: Helped me fill out my wardrobe!!
text:
After I got my first paycheck, I wanted to finally get some new cute clothes to replace my old ones. When I try to buy from shops in person, however, just one cute top can be $20 to $40!! Shein is a place to get clothes at a cheaper price and be able to look at a variety of designs and styles. 
Yes, you may make a bad purchase sometimes but you have the option to return and all of the cute clothes you can get is so worth the occasional flop. It‚Äôs also free-shipping on Sundays, so I just build my cart during the week and buy on Sunday. 

I do want to say that newcomers should take care to actually measure themselves and look at size charts. I would suggest staying away from jeans and shoes (except maybe flip flops) on the site bc those are just the type of item that you should really try on in store before purchasing.

title: SHEIN is amazing
